Articles.Content:
Hello.

Win7

**Ksp**:1.0.2

**CPU**:i7-4770k

**Mem**:16GB

**GPU**: Gtx 670

I use MSI Afterburner

GPU is stress tested throug programs and hours of gaming.

So hopefully i have straight forward problem here.

My GPU runs normal and then drops to idle and i get 1 fps. 

First obvious time it happend was when i got a MKS base on minmus and i was coming with one more ship, and the core and mem clock went to idle and i got 1fps. 

When ever i load my minmus base my card start at lets say 1084ishMhz good fps, then my card suddenly drops to idle and i get 1 fps.

i have tried leaving with the same ship but evry time i load the base everything drops. Then i go back to the "ksp base" and my card starts running normal again.

I got no idea what this could be. mod related/msiafterburner related/driver related, im open for ideas. thank you.

It has been working fine for a long time.

**mods**:

KerbalEngineer-1.0.16.6

KIS\_v1.1.3

MKS\_0.30.2

SCANsat-v12.0

TacLifeSupport\_0.11.1.20

InfernalRobotics\_V0.21.1

DMagic\_Orbital\_Science-1.0.2

Chatterer-0.9.1

KAS
